summary: Trapped overnight by an unknown assailant, a babysitter struggles to stay safe. As the hours tick by, she realizes that the greatest threat might be from the very children she's trying to protect.
cast: Hallee Hirsh|Austin Rogers|Linda Hamilton|Ted McGinley|Jeremy Dozier|Elsie Fisher|Andrew James Allen|Jessica Gardner|Martin Moakler|Nicki Hunter
director: Directors: Nicholas David Brandt, Lisa Hamil
title: Bad Behavior
